body:
We are recruiting for a number of roles with Care Homes, looking after the elderly. This is a great chance to relocate to the UK, live in a beautiful area by the seaside and to work within a rewarding role and build a career. We welcome candidates who have experience within medical / healthcare / looking after the sick and elderly or vulnerable but also candidates without experience as full training given.  ALSO HAVE OTHER ROLES AND POSITIONS FOR EXPERIENCE HEALTHCARE / MEDICAL / NURSE CANDIDATES. 

Duties will include:
- Working in care / nursing home environment
- Looking after elderly taking care of all their needs
- Helping with meal times, dressing, bathing and cleaning of the clients
- Talking and listening
- Giving medication ( if and when trained to do so)
- Cleaning and tidying of the home and areas
- Ensuring all clients are safe and comfortable 

Candidate:
- Ideally experience or qualifications in care or medical or nursing
- Full training for non-experienced candidates
- Good level of English
- Hardworking and trustworthy
- Friendly and caring

On offer
- Great rates of pay , depending on experience and qualifications and also whether it’s a night / day / weekend shift , from £7ph -£9.25ph 
- Ongoing training and support, to build career 
- Uniform provided
- Overtime and extra work available
- Assistance with relocation and accommodation
- Help with initial costs to move depending on experience

Positions both available immediately.

We are holding interviews in Bucharest Thurs 25th to Sunday 28th February and also on Skype. Please apply for more details.
title: Care Home Roles in  UK - £970 to £1500 a month
